typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['@concat(\'input_\',formatDateTime(utcnow(),\'yyyyMMdd\'),\'.csv\')']) ~> employeedata
employeedata derive(Column_4 = monthsBetween(toDate(Column_3, 'M/D/yyyy'), currentDate(), true())) ~> agemappeddata
agemappeddata sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mapped_input_data.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> mappedemployeefiledata
